articles.title: Nvidia Earnings Are the Stock Market Risk Event After Fed Rally
articles.summary: Traders are breathing easier heading into this week after Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell indicated that interest rate cuts are coming. The next test for the stock market will be a read on what’s been driving gains for the past few years: artificial intelligence euphoria.
articles.translated_title: Nvidia Earnings Are the Stock Market Risk Event After Fed Rally
articles.translated_summary: Traders are breathing easier heading into this week after Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell indicated that interest rate cuts are coming. The next test for the stock market will be a read on what’s been driving gains for the past few years: artificial intelligence euphoria.

articles.title: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman Says Parenthood Has 'Rewired' His Priorities And Approach To AI Development: 'Best, Most Amazing Thing Ever'
articles.summary: Sam Altman, CEO of OpenAI, shared how becoming a father has reshaped his perspective on artificial intelligence.

articles.title: Musk Says XAI Open Sources Grok 2.5
articles.summary: On a social media post, Elon Musk said his artificial intelligence startup xAI has open-sourced its Grok 2.5 model and plans to do the same for its Grok 3 model in roughly six months.

articles.title: Credit Fuels the AI Boom - and Fears of a Bubble
articles.summary: Credit investors are pouring billions of dollars into artificial intelligence investments, just as industry executives and analysts are raising questions about whether the new technology is inflating another bubble.

articles.title: Meta freezes AI hiring, even as boom continues
articles.summary: Meta halted all hiring for its artificial intelligence division, reportedly even pausing movement between teams within the company.
